# config/logstash-sample.conf

  # å¦‚å¢åŠ  -> index ä¿®æ”¹-> update
  translate {

   if [data][idx_record_opt] {

      add_field => { "idx_orig_record_value" => "%{[data][idx_orig_record_value]}" }

      "content" => "%{[data][content]}"

      "status" => "%{[data][status]}"
      "meta" => "%{[data][meta]}"
